WorkItem.ClosedComment: Ticket is old and we've changed a lot since then
WorkItem.Description:
When running rawr v3 beta under a linux environment using firefox and twilight. There is a error on load after the error almost any action taken after results in a browser crash.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
Open http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php using a linux machine using firefox w/ twilight. Error appears after a initial load lag. 
Closing the error and the beta notice message box. After this each time random actions will cause a crash. 
Always crashes on load from armory.
 
Additional Information:
Version: Rawr3 Public beta
OS: Unbuntu 10
 
Error list below:
Argument is out of range.
  at Mono.NativeMethods.collection_get_value_at (IntPtr instance, Int32 index) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.PresentationFrameworkCollection`1[T].GetItemImpl (Int32 index) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.PresentationFrameworkCollection`1[T].get_Item (Int32 index) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Controls.Accordion+<>c__DisplayClassd.<UnselectItem>b__b (Int32 i) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Linq.Enumerable.Count[Int32] (IEnumerable`1 source, System.Func`2 selector) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Controls.Accordion.UnselectItem (Int32 index, System.Object item) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Controls.Accordion.ChangeSelectedIndex (Int32 oldIndex, Int32 newIndex) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Controls.Accordion.OnSelectedIndexPropertyChanged (System.Windows.DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at (wrapper delegate-invoke) System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback:invoke_void__this___DependencyObject_DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs (System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
  at System.Windows.DependencyProperty.InvokeChangedCallback (System.Windows.DependencyObject obj, System.Windows.DependencyProperty property, System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback callback, System.Object old_obj, System.Object new_obj) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnmanagedPropertyChangedCallback (IntPtr dependency_object, IntPtr dependency_property, IntPtr old_value, IntPtr new_value) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnmanagedPropertyChangedCallbackSafe (IntPtr dependency_object, IntPtr propertyChangeArgs, Mono.MoonError& error, IntPtr unused) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

Comments.Message: I'm guessing Twilight is the update to Moonlight. If it is as bad as Moonlight was, Rawr3 won't work in Mono.
I have the same issue. Would there be any suggested alternative?

I have no idea, we don't claim that Rawr2 or Rawr3 works in Mono as we have no developers in those environments. This goes especially for Rawr3 which as far as we knew, the Silverlight port to Linux named Moonlight was like 2-3 years behind the times and couldn't support what Rawr3 needs.
